page.title: 02Waking Up in the Morning
page.content: I woke up on Wednesday morning with the light shining through my pink bedroom with a big poster of George Michael looking at me. Then I remembered it was school today - worse luck! I put on my navy blue uniform (yuck). Next, I was on my way to wash, still asleep, and past my sisters' bedroom. Rachel, aged five and just started school, was downstairs. But Joanne who is eight was still asleep. I went downstairs to have my break- fast - a cup of black coffee, lovely; some Sugar Puffs without any milk be- cause I don't like dairy products. I pick up my sandwich box and my flask and put them in my bag - then suddenly it's eight thirty and time to go to school. Joanne is still stuffing her breakfast but we say goodbye to Mum and go. Off round to Dawn's because her mum gives us a lift in her car.
